title: Login servers wont work
body:
Cannot login on LoL client, at first it was telling me login server issues and to check server status, so i changed my password and now its only telling me incorrect username and password even when i try a 2nd account its giving me the same response now and i am completely unable to login on any server or account.

I have:
Restarted
Repatched
Reinstalled
Changed DNS servers
Hextech repair tool

Still unable to login. Guess I'll just hope its fixed by tomorrow.

replies.body: There's currently an issue with logins that we're working to resolve. If you keep trying you *might* be able to log in but Ranked has been disabled while we work on a fix, as if you disconnect and have to log in again mid game you likely won't be able to.
Do we have an ETA on the fix at all?

Hi

Should be coming back online now - give it a shot and let us know how you go!

Cheers
Mindstar

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ti91hfAh,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-07-20T13:25:12.660+0000)
>
> Hi
> 
> Should be coming back online now - give it a shot and let us know how you go!
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

How long until ranked is back up?
We're just double checking its all fixed up and then will turn it back on :)  Barring any more issues it should only be a few moments.
There's a client notification up about it now and loss prevention has been turned on. They're working on it.
I just got in after getting the exact same issue
